data.Text: I'm also involved with a couple organizations on campus! I'm a project manager at [codebase], and I occasionally participate in IM sports ğŸ. I've also mentored for [csm] and have been active in [hkn].
I'm a student at UC Berkeley studying computer science and business under the [met] program. I'm currently interning at [stripe] this summer!
Previously, I did software engineering at [msft] Azure and ML research at [u.ai]. I also researched vision science for autonomous vehicles under Professor [whitney].
Thanks for stopping by â€” always down to chat!

In my free time, I love to build things ğŸ”§, make music ğŸ¹, stare at black lines ğŸŠâ€â™‚ï¸, try to make sense of our world ğŸ“š, and maximize the value of my Netflix subscription ğŸ“º. Check out some of my projects and recommended books/shows on the sidebar!
